description.raw:
Partially addresses issue #186 by disabling the color checker in our example dock worlds. This prevents teams from scoring points by reporting the default color sequence even when the light buoy is not present. The dock.xacro default value is also changed to false.

To test:

Launch an example dock task:

```
WORLD=dock0.world
roslaunch vrx_gazebo vrx.launch verbose:=true paused:=true wamv_locked:=true world:=${HOME}/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/worlds/$WORLD
```

Make sure you can’t contact the color checker service:

‌

```
rosservice call /vrx/scan_dock/color_sequence "red" "green" "blue" 
>>> ERROR: Service [/vrx/scan_dock/color_sequence] is not available.
```

Note that this should also work for all dockX.world files and all phase2\_dockX.world files, as well as the standalone launch file. To test the latter you have to rebuild the environment and use the launch file:

```
catkin_make
roslaunch vrx_gazebo dock.launch
```

‌

title: Dock disable color checker
